page.title: 04Stretton Sugwas Refuse Tip
page.content: The tip is operated by Hereford and Worcester County Council on land owned by the Prudential Assurance Company. It receives household refuse from parts of Leominster and S.Hereford- shire Districts and from the whole of Hereford City. Each of these author- ities collects refuse in its own area, the districts in plastic sacks and the City from dustbins, and pays the County Council for use of the tip. About 5OOO tons of refuse are deposit- ed each week, compacted mechanically and covered each day with soil to prevent pollution. The site is visited periodically by the Health and Safety Inspectorate. Householders may deposit refuse free, but a charge is made for trade refuse. Scrap metal deposited is sold. The tip covers about 7 acres and has acquired some land from the ARC gravel pit adjoining.
